trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Easton
There were no other sightings in Easton on or around October 31st 1968
divs: Sighting DetailsI went with Bubby to take his youger brother out for trick or treat.I looked up at cloudy firmament and saw a silver tinted disk slice down through the clouds then back up through the clouds again.Being I was 13 at the time I thought that I did not care if any one thought I was nuts or not.I saw a UFO and thats it.
